# metadatar

The goal of metadatar is to ...

## Installation

You can install the released version of metadatar from [CRAN](https://CRAN.R-project.org) with:

``` r
install.packages("metadatar")
```

## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

```{r example}
library(gapminder)
library(metadatar)
get_meta_shell(gapminder)
```
